trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Net.Http" /> namespace provides a programming interface for modern HTTP applications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Net.Http" /> 命名空间提供用于现代 HTTP 应用程序的编程接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http> namespace is designed to provide the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http>旨在提供以下命名空间：

trans-unit.source: HTTP client components that allow users to consume modern web services over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户通过 HTTP 使用最新的 web 服务的 HTTP 客户端组件。

trans-unit.source: HTTP components that can be used by both clients and servers (HTTP headers and messages, for example).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的 HTTP 组件由客户端和服务器 （HTTP 标头和消息，例如）。

trans-unit.source: This provides a consistent programming model on both the client and the server side for modern web services over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 这提供一致的编程模型在客户端和服务器端上最新的 web 服务通过 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http> namespace and the related <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers> namespace provide the following set of components:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http>命名空间和相关<xref:System.Net.Http.Headers>命名空间具有以下一组的组件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> - the primary class used to send and receive requests over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> -用来发送和接收通过 HTTP 请求的主类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage> and <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> - HTTP messages as defined in RFC 2616 by the IETF.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage> 和<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage>-HTTP 消息的 IETF RFC 2616 中定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpHeaders> - HTTP headers as defined in RFC 2616 by the IETF.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpHeaders> -HTTP 标头由 IETF RFC 2616 中定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler> - HTTP handlers responsible for producing HTTP response messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler> 负责生成 HTTP 响应消息的 HTTP 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: There are various HTTP message handles that can be used.
trans-unit.target: 有可用的各种 HTTP 消息处理。

trans-unit.source: These include the following.
trans-unit.target: 这些包括以下内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.DelegatingHandler> - A class used to plug a handler into a handler chain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.DelegatingHandler> -A 类，用于处理程序链中插入一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler> - A simple to class to derive from that supports the most common requirements for most applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler> 的到类，以派生自支持的最常见的要求，对于大多数应用程序一个简单。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler> - A class that operates at the bottom of the handler chain that actually handles the HTTP transport operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler> 的操作处理 HTTP 传输操作的实际的处理程序链底部一个类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler> - A specialty class that operates at the bottom of the handler chain class that handles HTTP transport operations with options that are specific to the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler> -操作处理 HTTP 传输操作使用特定于的选项的处理程序链类底部 a specialty 类<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: The contents of an HTTP message corresponds to the entity body defined in RFC 2616.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 消息的内容对应于 RFC 2616 中定义的实体正文。

trans-unit.source: A number of classes can be used for HTTP content.
trans-unit.target: 多个类可以用于 HTTP 内容。

trans-unit.source: These include the following.
trans-unit.target: 这些包括以下内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent> - HTTP content based on a byte array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent> HTTP 内容基于字节数组。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.FormUrlEncodedContent> - HTTP content of name/value tuples encoded using application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.FormUrlEncodedContent> 使用应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded MIME 类型编码的名称/值元组的 HTTP 内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent> - HTTP content that gets serialized using the multipart/* content type specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent> 使用多部分获取序列化的 HTTP 内容 / * 内容类型规范。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartFormDataContent> - HTTP content encoded using the multipart/form-data MIME type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartFormDataContent> 的使用 multipart/form-data MIME 类型编码 HTTP 内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.StreamContent> - HTTP content based on a stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.StreamContent> -基于 HTTP 内容流。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Http.StringContent> - HTTP content based on a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.StringContent> HTTP 内容基于的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If an app using the <xref:System.Net.Http> and <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers> namespaces intends to download large amounts of data (50 megabytes or more), then the app should stream those downloads and not use the default buffering.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用使用<xref:System.Net.Http>和<xref:System.Net.Http.Headers>命名空间打算下载大量数据 （50 兆字节或更多），则应用程序应流式传输的下载文件并不使用的默认缓冲。

trans-unit.source: If the default buffering is used the client memory usage will get very large, potentially resulting in substantially reduced performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的默认缓冲，则客户端内存使用情况将变得很大，可能会显著导致性能下降。

trans-unit.source: Classes in the <xref:System.Net.Http> and <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers> namespaces can be used to develop Windows Store apps or desktop apps.
trans-unit.target: 中的类<xref:System.Net.Http>和<xref:System.Net.Http.Headers>命名空间可以用于开发 Windows 应用商店应用或桌面应用。

trans-unit.source: When used in a Windows Store app, classes in the <xref:System.Net.Http> and <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers> namespaces are affected by network isolation feature, part of the application security model used by the [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中的 Windows 应用商店应用中使用时，类<xref:System.Net.Http>和<xref:System.Net.Http.Headers>命名空间受网络隔离功能，使用的应用程序安全模型的一部分[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The appropriate network capabilities must be enabled in the app manifest for a Windows Store app for the system to allow network access by a Windows store app.
trans-unit.target: 必须在系统允许进行网络访问通过 Windows 应用商店应用的 Windows 应用商店应用的应用程序清单中启用相应的网络功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Network Isolation for Windows Store Apps](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-isolation-for-windows-store-apps.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[适用于 Windows Store 应用的网络隔离](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-isolation-for-windows-store-apps.md)。
